casebody.data:
BRIDGE GROUP INVESTMENTS, LLC, a California limited liability company, Appellant/Cross-Respondent,
v.
Jeffrey CHAUNCEY, an individual; and Rainbow-Oakey Plaza, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Respondents/Cross-Appellants. No. 73843 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 09, 2018

Garman Turner Gordon

Marquis Aurbach Coffing

ORDER DISMISSING APPEAL AND CROSS-APPEAL

Pursuant to the stipulation of the parties, and cause appearing, this appeal and cross-appeal are dismissed. The parties shall bear their own costs and attorney fees. NRAP 42(b).

It is so ORDERED.
